|availability = sampling |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] ''’‘Cascade’’'' QCA9994 *Mini PCIe interface with PCIe 2.0 , JTAG/UART connector *Industrial Grade, 5GHz max 21dBm output power (per chain) *802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11a/n (1.73Gbps) *2x spatial streams (2SS) MIMO '''160/80+80''' MHz bandwidth support *4x spatial streams (4SS) Multi-user MIMO (MU-MIMO) *802.11ac explicit transmit beamforming (TxBF) and legacy implicit :TxBF for both beamformer and beamformee *Supports Spatial Multiplexing, Maximal Ratio Combining (MRC), :Cyclic-Delay Diversity (CDD), Space Time Block Code (STBC), :Low-Density Parity Check (LDPC) Codes *Supports Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS) *Supports 802.11d,e,h,i,j,k,r,u, v time stamp, w and z standards *Designed for High Bandwidth Enterprise Wireless Access Points
===Purchase Sample=== [https://www.shop.compex.com.sg/product-page/wle1216v5-20-industrial-grade Compex System Sample Store]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
